column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=For my 13th birthday I decided I 'd bake my own cake instead of having my Mom buy one for me .
#id=2
#text=To keep it simple my Mom bought a Betty Crocker cake mix .
#id=3
#text=Once my friends arrived we gathered in the kitchen to make the cake .
#id=4
#text=The first thing we did was set the stove to the temperature indicated on the box .
#id=5

#text=While the stove warmed up I asked my friend Nikki to be in charge of getting things from the fridge while my friend Stephanie went to the cabinets to get whatever I called out that was needed there .
#id=6
#text=Once we had the bowls , measuring cups , and liquid ingredients from the fridge we were ready to start mixing .
#id=7
#text=Three people making a cake is a bit difficult to do , but we had fun talking while we were doing it and I ended up doing most of it while my friends chatted with me .
#id=8
#text=I put the mix in the bowl and added the fresh ingredients .
#id=9
#text=We took turns mixing that up and then poured the mix into a cake pan that Nikki greased with some butter .
#text=I then put the cake into the stove while wearing oven mitts and set the stove 's timer to the suggested baking time on the box .
#text=While it baked we could n't help spooning out some icing for ourselves .
